artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of two belt buckles on the left; in the center a woman holding a green fan in a white gown with a purple overgown and a hat with pink ribbon and red flowers with green stems; on the right a woman with a walking stick in a white gown with a pink sash around her waist and a hat with blue flowers with green stems
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Vingt-deuxième Cahier, 1 Juillet 1789
